definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: The advantages and applications of powder metallurgy materials in electrical appliances are briefly introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了家用电器中的粉末冶金材料的特点和应用慨况。

sentences.chinese: 上海亮马河家用电器有限公司。

sentences.english: A bride's parents often buy a whole set of white goods as a dowry.
sentences.chinese: 新娘的父母通常都买一整套的家用电器作为嫁妆陪嫁。

sentences.english: The price of household appliances such as washing machines rises by a few pounds.
sentences.chinese: 像洗衣机这样的家用电器价格将会上涨几英镑。

sentences.english: At least 5 years working experience in CB or household appliance sales.
sentences.chinese: 有5年以上家用电器或壁挂炉销售经验。

sentences.english: Electric cooker series products and other household appliances, one of the large enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 电炖锅系列产品以及其它家用电器的大型企业之一。

sentences.english: Change electric equipment into energy-efficient ones and leave only one light on when you leave home.
sentences.chinese: 把家用电器换成节能型的，出门时最多留一盏灯开着。

sentences.english: One is standards for a variety of household appliances.
sentences.chinese: 其中之一是用于多种家用电器的标准。

sentences.english: You can find house appliances that can still be used in junkyards .
sentences.chinese: 在废物堆积场你可以找到一些还能用的家用电器。

sentences.english: His wife lavished money upon household appliances.
sentences.chinese: 他妻子在家用电器上的滥花钱。
